author: Wachsman, Joshua
message:
feat: Add React/TypeScript web app with 3 visualization drafts

Implements TV writer overlap explorer with:
- Draft 1: Force-directed graph (D3) - shows connected by shared writers
- Draft 2: Interactive Venn diagram - select 2-3 shows to compare
- Draft 3: Matrix heatmap - grid of shared writer counts

Architecture:
- Functional core: pure types and functions in src/core/
- Imperative shell: API client in src/shell/
- 35 unit tests for function composition
- Strict TypeScript with noImplicitAny

Also adds Python API server (scraper/api.py) to serve data as JSON.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Wachsman, Joshua
message:
feat: Add IMDB TV show writer scraper

Implements Python scraper using requests/BeautifulSoup to extract
writer credits from IMDB's fullcredits pages. Uses __NEXT_DATA__ JSON
for reliable data extraction.

Includes:
- SQLite database with normalized schema (shows, writers, show_writers)
- Support for extracting episode counts and writer roles
- Seeded with 10 shows: Gilmore Girls, Scrubs, Better Off Ted, etc.
- Found 271 writers with 10 showing cross-show overlap

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
